title: Group portrait of members of the Hibiscus Neighborhood Club, seated, left to right: Mary Davis, Ossic Aughry, Adellar Yarbrough, Gertrude Stevens, baby Shelly Hall, and Georgianna Briscoe; standing: Jennie Cissell, Charlie Johnson, Murdies Brown, Channie Thomas, Fannie White, Willie L. Yarbrough, Elizabeth McKenzie, M.W. Edison, Daisy Barnett, Corkie Williams, and Rachel Washington, gathered around table for Christmas party in home of Elizabeth McKenzie
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
